AlertSetting.PERMIT_SLIDER1A: Permit COVID ALERT GPS TO accees my location
AlertSetting.ALERT_SLIDER2A: Alert me if the establishment doesn't require social distancing
AlertSetting.ALERT_SLIDER3A: Alert me if the establishment doesn't require the public to wear a face mask
AlertSetting.ALERT_SLIDER4B: Alert me if the establishment doesn't require employees to wear a face mask
AlertSetting.ALERT_SLIDER5A: Alert me if I'm entering a  "hot spot"
AlertSetting.ALERT_SLIDER6A: Alert me if I'm an entering an establishment that requires social distancing and face mask for everybody to everybody

EmailImSetting.PERMIT_COVID1: Permit COVID ACTION ALERT to email / IM me regarding COVID public health alerts
EmailImSetting.PERMIT_COVID2: Permit COVID ACTION ALERT to email / IM me to follow-up on my reports or emails to COVID ACTION ALERT
EmailImSetting.PERMIT_COVID3: Permit COVID ACTION ALERT to email / IM me regarding COVID public health alerts I have visited or reported
EmailImSetting.PERMIT_COVID4: Permit COVID ACTION ALERT to email / IM me regarding COVID matters at my place of employment
